Class InputMaster<T extends City>

java.lang.Object
Lab5.InputStaff.InputMaster<T>
Type Parameters:

Direct Known Subclasses:

public abstract class InputMaster<T extends City> extends Object
class contains all needed methods for all InputMaster classes
